name: add-label-to-pr
description: WIP GitHub App which automatically adds a label to Pull Request based on base branch.

name: adobe-xd-disable-proto-arrows-navigation
description: Disables left/right arrows navigation for Adobe XD shared prototypes (xd.adobe.com/view/*).

name: delete-branch-after-pr-merge
description: GitHub App which automatically deletes branch when Pull Request is merged.

name: jira-harvest-agile-board
description: Userscript to add button in top right corner of Jira Agile board to start tracking time in HarvestApp.

name: npm-run-bash-completion
description: npm-run-bash-completion-node is an alternative to npm's own run/run-script command completion.

name: VirDesk
description: Console utility for working with Windows 10 Virtual Desktops.
